title: Permissions
description: Schema for tracking permissions for vehicles and goods, including personal details of the person receiving permission.

id.title: The unique ID of the permission.

vehicle_id.title: The ID of the vehicle being granted permission (nullable for item permissions).

category_id.title: The category id of item being given permission (nullable if vehicle).

description.title: A description of the item being granted permission for (optional).

user_id.title: The ID of the tenant/vehicle owner.

allowed_user_name.title: The name of the person receiving permission.

allowed_user_phone.title: The phone number of the person receiving permission.

allowed_user_national_id.title: The phone number of the person receiving permission.

permission_type_id.title: The type of permission (e.g., temporary or permanent).

expires_at.title: The check-out time in ISO 8601 format. (null for permanent permissions).

created_at.title: The timestamp when the permission was created.

updated_at.title: The timestamp when the permission was last updated.
